message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $6000, you get $4000.  This way we both benefit from ending the game quickly.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe we can both do better. This time, I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with time! This is your chance to secure a good deal before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further. I get $5500, you get $4500.
